author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-2334: Optimize JavaScript generation for FormInjector

author: sobryan
msg: * Fixed configurators to handle resource requests
* Enabled the PARTIAL_RENDERING capability for portlets
Again, this fix is JSR-286 specific and totally alpha code.  It's
intended to help with debugging the MyFaces Portlet Bridge 2.0 and
PPR requests in a portlet environment.  Official JSR-286 support for
Trinidad will probably have to require an additional library.

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-1528] Fix problems if there is a schema element that has no types defined in it directly.  It just imports and enother schema.  JAXB creates a JPackage for it, but doesn't generate anything in it.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-12 when hbase regionserver restarts, it says "impossible state for createLease()"
